EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing the DU-875 Upgrade offered by Banyan Air Service
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Frustrated by failures and exchange costs on your DU-870 displays? Stop supporting your aircraft with spares that have a limited life span. Instead, improve your vision and add instant value to your aircraft by upgrading to Honeywell Primus Elite DU-875 LCD displays with Banyan Air Service. Below are some benefits that you will have with Honeywell`s DU-875 screen.
- Updates cockpit to latest technology with a quick "plug and play" display - Removes obsolescence issue facing DU-870 CRTs - Lowers your cost of operation - increases reliability by 2X and lowers weight by seven pounds per display unit - Brings a brighter, clearer, high resolution picture to the pilots that runs cooler and creates less heat in the cockpit - Operators can replace display units one at a time upon failure or all displays at once - Positions aircraft to later add operational features as part of the Primus Elite upgrade such as electronic charts, advanced maps, maintenance pages, optional Weather XM® information, and even Synthetic Vision (SVS).
To learn more about Honeywell`s DU-875 upgrade, please click below! LEARN MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/replace-your-du-870-with-du-875-receive-benefits]]>
